data.title: Microsoft’s metaverse plans are getting clearer with its $68.7 billion Activision acquisition
data.description: Microsoft's planned $68.7 billion acquisition of gaming company Activision Blizzard is just the latest signal of how CEO Satya Nadella aims to dominate the metaverse.

data.title: Microsoft's Activision Blizzard deal poses 'monumental challenge' to Sony
data.description: Microsoft's blockbuster purchase of video game developer Activision Blizzard could pose a serious threat for Sony.

data.title: Sony shares tank over 12% after Microsoft and Activision's $68.7 billion tie-up plan
data.description: Investors fear Microsoft's planned acquisition of Activision will bring more competition to Sony's PlayStation and take away key games from Sony's platforms.
